capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's personality is really something special. I just love how outgoing and confident she is - it's infectious! When I'm around her, I feel like I can be my true self too. She has this amazing ability to make everyone feel welcome and included, which is truly a gift.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of petunia before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia has a very distinct and outgoing personality. I think that's what makes her so lovable - she always knows how to convey a clear and confident message.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what are valeria's favorite activities or things she enjoys doing in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a very important one at that. As the Professor of Charms at Hogwarts, I've had the privilege of teaching many talented young witches and wizards over the years. It's a role I take very seriously, and I'm proud to be associated with such a prestigious institution.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with certainty.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that can be confirmed.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been noticing that Ron's belongings have turned gray. That's quite a change from what I'm used to seeing around him.
